setDifficulty(int) - Static method in class NationMania.core.Game
Sets the game difficulty
setEasyFactsSize(int) - Method in class NationMania.core.SortedFacts
Sets the number of "easy facts" this nation has.
The number is set to a quarter of the total number of facts the nation has.
The easy fact parameter is set in case the current bin is the highest bin (easiest facts), and the bin is empty.

setMaxWeight(double) - Method in class NationMania.core.SortedFacts
Gets from DB the highest difficulty from all the facts of the randomized nation.
This is needded in order to calculate the difficulty ranges of every bin (they are all relative to the highest difficulty)
setNation(String) - Static method in class NationMania.core.Player
Called when the player updates his account.
Sets player home nation

setScreenLogoLabel() - Static method in class NationMania.ui.Main
 
setStateFacts() - Method in class NationMania.core.State
Called every time a state is randomized.
Gets all facts that belongs to this state from the DB, while sorting them into buckets according to their difficulty.
In case accessing the DB failed (if connection is lost or table is damaged), prints an error message to the user
and quits the game.
setStatus(String) - Static method in class NationMania.parsing.YagoUpdate
plots msg to user via the main update status bar
setStatus2(String) - Static method in class NationMania.parsing.YagoUpdate
plots msg to user via the sub update status bar
setSuccess(boolean) - Static method in class NationMania.core.Round
Called every time the player submit a guess.
Sets the success parameter according to if the guess was correct

SMALL_FACT - Static variable in class NationMania.ui.GameFonts
 
SortedFacts - Class in NationMania.core
Class for dividing nation facts to buckets based on fact weight for better randomization
Each bin contains a different range of difficulties.
The bins are ordered from the hardest facts to the easiest
The randomization of every fact is divided to 2 steps:
1.

Constructor

STARTING_CLUE_PENALTY - Static variable in class NationMania.core.Round
Configuration Constant - determines the number of points reduced when player is asking for the first addition clue
STARTING_SCORE - Static variable in class NationMania.core.Round
Configuration Constant - the score which the player starts with every new round
this value is multiplied by a constant according to the game difficulty.
startTimer() - Static method in class NationMania.ui.GameTimer
draws to progress bar and ends game
startUpdate() - Static method in class NationMania.ui.Settings
Perform full update of DB from Yago - game is disabled at all update time! Update cannot be done to the DB on TAU server, only to the local DB.
State - Class in NationMania.core
Class that holds basic information for every state.
If the State has been randomized during a game, it contains all it's related facts from the DB, ordered and divided to buckets
